sentences.en: “People ask me what it's like to see his face on TV,” Ms. Weston, a retired psychotherapist, said on Thursday in her Upper East Side apartment. “It's always a bit of a shock when you first see him.
sentences.cn: “人们问我在电视上看到他的脸时有什么感受时，”一个已经退休的精神治疗医师，威士顿女士，周二在她的曼哈顿上东区公寓接受采访时说，“当第一次看到他时，你通常会有些震惊。”

sentences.en: Anyone can call themselves a psychotherapist.
sentences.cn: 谁都可以自称是心理治疗师。

sentences.en: He found a psychotherapist near him to supervise his work with a surrogate, and flew the surrogate out from Los Angeles.
sentences.cn: 他发现一名心理治疗师在旁边监督他与代理的工作，并让代理从洛杉矶飞往他那里。

sentences.en: The psychotherapist analyzed and explained the cause of his autism.
sentences.cn: 心理医生剖释了他自闭的原因.

sentences.en: Your doctor, health care practitioner or psychotherapist will help you determine the best course of action to have you feel strong and well again.
sentences.cn: 你的医生，健康护理从业者或精神治疗师将帮助你确定最好的治疗方案，去帮助你再次感觉到强壮和健康。

words.tran_cn: 精神性欲的；有性特性的
身心的；身心失调的；身心治疗的
心理物理学；精神物理学
心理生理学；精神生理学

trans.tran_cn: 采用精神治疗法的医生
trans.tran_en: A psychotherapist is a person who treats people who are mentally ill using psychotherapy
